name: Scared of Shadows
description:
Description

“Scared of Shadows” is a short game in which our unnamed protagonist enters his school to find the books he left inside. Not everything is as it seems, though. Out of the corner of his eye, the shadows begin to move, but, once he leaves, he’s safe, isn’t he?

He’s safe, isn’t he?

Instructions

The game should be played more than once. For the purpose of this GameJam, we will inform you that there are only three iterations to play through before the game ends.

The goals of the game are to:

- Pick up the Janitor’s Key in Classroom C1

- Pick up the Classroom Key in the Janitor’s Room

- Pick up the Books in Classroom B1

- Leave the School

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

E, F, or SPACE to interact or pick up
